title: Inquire About Life Insurance Policy Exclusions
description: A policyholder wants to understand what is not covered by their life insurance policy.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and retrieve their policy document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's policy contract.

tasks.description: Review the exclusions section of the policy contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the contract and finds the standard suicide clause (typically for the first two years).

tasks.description: Clearly explain the specific exclusions listed in the policy to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the suicide clause and any other relevant exclusions in simple terms.
